item.description:
you don't have to dress too fancy as jeans are acceptable, but you may want to dress to impress.

Mama Kicks will rock your socks, and we always have a rockin' evening, dancing at the Derryfield like sardines on the dance floor.

the band is awesome, but what really stinks is they don't start playing until 9:30ish.  I'm such an early to bed, early to rise on these real estate selling weekends...I've just got to get out of this rut and BOOGIE!

So, 7:30-8pm for dinner, and we'll entertain each other until the band stops partying and starts partying and playing...whoever gets there first, try and get some space for us.

The Derryfield is on Mammoth Rd, in Manchester and are usually pretty accomodating.  I'll try and find out when the cover charge of $5 starts and warn you ahead of time.

Hope to meetup with you, and get down!

Suz
item.how_to_find_us: look for meetup signs or the loud crowd

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Let's get down and dirty 'cause Mama Kicks!! :)
